question: Which of the following is the main objective of Insolvency Professional Entity?
option1: To implement bankruptcy law under The Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016
option2: To facilitate speedy recoveries of high value loan defaults
answer: To facilitate speedy recoveries of high value loan defaults
explanation: Insolvency Professional Entity is a special body under Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI) to facilitate speedy recoveries of high value loan defaults.
